title: Marten Thavenius
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019003822/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019003822/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Mårten Thavenius**

Mårten Thavenius is a [Swedish](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019003822/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sweden) type designer. This far, he has released Rattlescript, Aptifer Slab and Aptifer Sans, and Skilt Gothic.

Mårten Thavenius is a GUI Architecht at IBM.

He runs the type foundry [Fontcaster](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019003822/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontcaster).
author: Textism
